item.title: Hypo-Allergenic Cats Now Available for Pre-Order
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: "Allerca Inc is now taking reservations for genetically engineered hypo-allergenic cats, which it calls 'lifestyle pets'... and apparently they are just the beginning... Read the press release here... and you can take delivery of a cuddy non-sinus bothering bundle of joy for just $3500...." Now I'll be able to hang around "cat people" without breaking into a sneezing and wheezing fit. (Link courtesy of Slashdot)
